document_data.name: ''Pouch of winds''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''pouch of winds''''' was a magical bag that, when opened, allowed its holder to summon a strong wind to the aid or detriment of sailing ships.
document_data.Appearance: This [[magic]]al item looked like an ordinary [[leather]] [[pouch]] that was full to the point of bulging with its contents.
document_data.Function: When a ''pouch of winds'' was opened, the user would decide if ''favorable'' or ''contrary'' winds were wanted. If the former was chosen, the current weather conditions would change a strong and steady gust blew in the direction that they chose. If the latter was selected, a wind of the same force would blow against the current direction of any ship in sight of the user. In either case, the winds would last for 2–24 hours, after which they would return to their original course and patterns.
document_data.Creation: These pouches were created with use of the [[spell]] ''[[wind wall]]''.
